pages.text: The $(item)Primordialis Reactor$() is a machine that turns plant matter (like saplings or crops) into $(item)Primordium$(). It requires heat that only an $(item)Energion Aeroheater$() can provide, and will need a lot of infrastructure to work at an acceptable speed.$(br2)Items can be inserted/extracted from all sides except top and bottom.

Putting different items simultaneously in it will cause it to be both faster and more efficient. 9 different items at once will allow it to require roughly 8x less items and 72x less time than with a single type of item.
